phrases: Being big is a good thing!
Being big is a good thing!
La, la, la, la, la, la...
It is going to eat us!
Let us go for a drive!
I would rather stay home and play games.
Because our car is a Dekantea!
Being big is a good thing!
Take your whole house on a drive with Dekantea!
Being big is a good thing!
Visit your local dealer for a test drive today.
I guess it cannot be helped.
Just sleep in the car, then.
Wake me up when we get to school.
You have a license, do not you, Onii-chan?
Bomber said you got a perfect score in driving school.
He just had to open his big mouth.
Well, you know, I commute by train.
But you said we would go to the ocean sometime soon.
but it is rare that Umaru is interested in anything outdoors-y at all.
I probably should not let this opportunity slip by.
Well, I guess I could just take a look.
By the way, about this car...
Hybrids are a great buy right now.
So its fuel consumption is low?
They might be the same car, but just look at how much you save on gas!
Working in sales must be rough...
Does not this one look good?
Car Name: TOMODA Dekantea Body Color 8 Passenger Seating
Umaru, there are only two of us.
We do not need such a big car.
This would fit more than six people.
if we were to go out with Ebina-chan and Kirie-chan, a bigger one would be better.
Oh, and if you include Bomber, that is five people.
She was thinking of her friends, too?
Why not take it for a test drive?
Being big is a good thing!
Being big is a good thing!
La, la, la, la, la, la...
La, la, la, la, la, la...
Being big is a good thing!
Take your whole house on a drive with Dekantea!
An accident on a test drive...
Onii-chan, let us just go in Bomber's car.
Damn, you got a perfect score even in driving school?
I would rather just laze around at home.
You are totally looking forward to it.
Hey, where are we going to visit the ocean?
From here, I guess there is the Miura Peninsula, or Shounan...
If we are going to go, we should go to Okinawa or Hawaii.
How many nights are you planning to stay?
Hey, you think we should have the pet shop take care of the hamsters?
Again, this is a day trip.
Umaru's actually pretty excited about this.
It is always important to be prepared in advance.
First, we need to deflate the inner tube and fold it.
We should probably pack some extra towels.
We are taking a thermal bag, so we need to freeze the ice packs.
I will leave the lid open so we do not forget to pack it.
And there might be mosquitoes, so we will take anti-itch ointment.
All right, we need to get an early start, so let us get plenty of sleep.
And the alarm clock has been set.
All right, I am turning off the lights.
You are really excited about this, are not you?
Yeah, in front of our building is fine.
Um... I heard from Umaru-chan that we were meeting here this morning.
It is me, my little sister, and her two friends, so it will be four of us.
Thank you so much for inviting me today.
Let us make this a fun holiday.
Man, it is been forever since I have been to the ocean.
Oh, this is Umaru's friend Ebina-chan.
He is going to find out!
Taihei, is this Tanukichi's friend, too?
This is the first time he is seen this Umaru.
She is Umaru, my little sister.
And why does she have the same name as Tanukichi?
His two younger sisters both have the same name...
If I remember correctly, Taihei's family is super loaded.
Could they have some tragic soap opera-like relationship?!
I will not ask you for details.
Just know that I will always be on your side.

Kana Order Correction Enoshima Change Area All Areas Change Genres All Genres Enoshima Station (Enoshima Railways)/Kanagawa Prefecture Fujisawa City Enoshima Railways Enoshima Station/Kanagawa Prefecture Fujisawa City Katase-Enoshima Station (Odakyuu)/Kanagawa Prefecture Fujisawa City Shin-Enoshima Aquarium/Kanagawa Prefecture Fujisawa City Enoshima Shrine/Kanagawa Prefecture Fujisawa City
We should get there by about 10:00.
I am happy to be with Umaru-san, but I wonder where Master is.
Kirie-chan, what do you want to see when we go to Enoshima?
Could it be that she caught a cold?
Keep your eyes on the road!
What did you start shouting for?
Kirie is the same name as my younger sister.
I thought she looked similar, other than the hairstyle,
but to think she had the same name, too...
Man, I guess coincidences like that do happen.
Anyway, Kirie-chan, you wanted to ask me something?
Y-You seem a bit down, so I was worried...
I am started to feel hyped up now.
Let us walk around the island.
Yeah, we have walked for quite a while.
Why do not we get some lunch?
I had them pick some recommendations for us.
They look like they are having fun.
Was Komaru-san not feeling well today?
They think your head is a nest!
That is actually my older brother.
I just changed my hair slightly, and he does not even realize I am his sister.
He is seriously a complete idiot.
He is been like that ever since I was little.
When he tries to pick on me at home, I hit him and stuff.
At the high school entrance ceremony, he showed up instead of my mother...
So I picked a fight as usual,
and my classmates started to fear me.
Ever since I met Master and Onii-san, I have been able to talk more...
A-And you started talking to me more at school.
S-So... I am worried that something might have happened to Master.
You wanted to come to the aquarium, right?
Komaru could not come because something urgent came up.
I am just glad she is not sick.
I might have said this before,
but thank you for always playing with her.
I should have brought my little sister.
Your little sister that has the same name as Kirie-chan?
She is super violent, though, always punching me and kicking me.
She barely speaks to me anymore since I went to her high school entrance ceremony.
Maybe I should not have gone.
I do not think that is true.
No little sister would not be happy that her big brother showed up.
Sh-She is such a nice girl.
It is been so long since someone is been so kind to me...
Man, if only you would been my little sister, Ebina-chan.
Did the high school girl lose her mind?!
Somehow that blow seems really familiar!
What the heck are you doing?
I am sure he somehow offended Kirie-chan, but...
I will keep an eye on him, so why do not you guys go play in the water?
It takes a little courage to get in the ocean at first, since it is kind of cold.
It seems like they are almost there...
Oh, it is Kirie-san and... Ebikouji-san, right?
I told you, it is Ebina!
I am enjoying a summer holiday with my older brother.
A summer holiday on a yacht...
That aside, I never thought I would run into you here, Umaru-san.
Long-distance swimming, beach volleyball, watermelon breaking!
Since we are at the ocean, why do not we put the battles aside,
Let us play to our hearts' content!
Bomber, I bought you a drink.
There is a new one with them.
I feel like I have seen her before...
I guess she is another friend.
Playing with everyone was indeed very fun.
I hope we get to play together again,
even after summer vacation is over.
I kind of feel like I was sleeping the whole time, though.
By the way, where is Tanukichi today?
She must have had a lot of fun.
She must have had some party last night and stayed up late, huh?
I want to go to the ocean again.
Just tough it out until our next day off.
Umaru seemed to have a lot of fun at the ocean...
Want to go somewhere again next time I have a day off?
If you will carry me up and down it on your back, sure.
More importantly, would you go buy the Jumpu I forgot to buy?
Actually, if you would just bought it on your way home from work,
you could have saved the hassle.
